report.title: Inspirational Journey (Poem)
report.author: Spike-KG
report.bodytext: Back from the grave, /n Reborn again. /n Dont know how to behave, /n Dont know how it began. /n /n In total confusion, /n Where I lay. /n Lifes an illusion, /n A game I play. /n /n Dazed and confused, /n I look at the ceiling. /n My minds been abused, /n But I just love the feeling. /n /n The ceiling is twirling, /n The walls only pulse. /n The carpet is curling, /n But I know its all false. /n /n Stuck in a world, /n Parallel to mine. /n The colors all swirled, /n A vision benign. /n /n I roam around, /n Unable to speak. /n Falling off the ground, /n As I reach my peak.
